message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I am willing to pay $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $90.  Would you consider meeting me halfway?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay $87 for the product.
